title: Anna University Recruitment 2026 - Apply Online for 02 Professional Assistant I Posts
description: Anna University has announced the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Professional Assistant I Jobs. These candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the Anna University Recruitment 2026 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salarystructure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply online before the last date of application...
